Token.Abstract: XMMEnduserApi is the main part of the XamoomSDK. You can use it to send api request to the xamoom-api.
The preferred language of the user.

XMMRestClient used to call rest api.

Initializes with a apikey. You find your apikey in your xamoom system in Settings.

Parameter.Name: apikey
Parameter.Abstract: Your xamoom api key

Token.Abstract: Initializes with a custom XMMRestClient.

Parameter.Name: restClient
Parameter.Abstract: Custom XMMRestClient

Token.Abstract: API call to get content with specific ID.

Parameter.Name: contentID
Parameter.Abstract: ContentID of xamoom content

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request - param1 content Content from xamoom system - param2 error NSError, can be null

Token.Abstract: API call to get content with specific ID and options.

Parameter.Name: contentID
Parameter.Abstract: ContentID of xamoom content

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: XMMContentOptions for call

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request - param1 content Content from xamoom system - param2 error NSError, can be null

Token.Abstract: API call to get content with specific location-identifier.

Parameter.Name: locationIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: Locationidentifier from xamoom marker

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request - param1 content Content from xamoom system - param2 error NSError, can be null

Token.Abstract: API call to get content with beacon.

Parameter.Name: major
Parameter.Abstract: Major of the beacon

Parameter.Name: minor
Parameter.Abstract: Minor of the beacon

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request - param1 content Content from xamoom system - param2 error NSError, can be null

Token.Abstract: API call to get contents around location (40m).
Token.Declaration: - (void)contentsWithLocation:(CLLocation *)location pageSize:(int)pageSize cursor:(NSString *)cursor sort:(XMMContentSortOptions)sortOptions completion:(void ( ^ ) ( NSArray *contents , bool hasMore , NSString *cursor , NSError *error ))completion

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: Location of the user

Parameter.Name: pageSize
Parameter.Abstract: PageSize you want to get from xamoom cloud

Parameter.Name: cursor
Parameter.Abstract: Needed when paging, can be null

Parameter.Name: sortOptions
Parameter.Abstract: XMMContentSortOptions to sort result

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request - param1 contents Contents from xamoom system - param2 hasMore True if more items on xamoom cloud - param3 cursor Cursor for paging - param4 error NSError, can be null

Token.Abstract: API call to get contents with specific tags.
Token.Declaration: - (void)contentsWithTags:(NSArray *)tags pageSize:(int)pageSize cursor:(NSString *)cursor sort:(XMMContentSortOptions)sortOptions completion:(void ( ^ ) ( NSArray *contents , bool hasMore , NSString *cursor , NSError *error ))completion

Parameter.Name: tags
Parameter.Abstract: Array of tags

Parameter.Name: pageSize
Parameter.Abstract: PageSize you want to get from xamoom cloud

Parameter.Name: cursor
Parameter.Abstract: Needed when paging, can be null

Parameter.Name: sortOptions
Parameter.Abstract: XMMContentSortOptions to sort result

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request - param1 contents Contents from xamoom system - param2 hasMore True if more items on xamoom cloud - param3 cursor Cursor for paging - param4 error NSError, can be null

Token.Abstract: API call to get spots inside radius of a location.

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: Location of the user

Parameter.Name: radius
Parameter.Abstract: Radius in meter

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: XMMSpotOptions to get markers or content

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request - param1 spots Spots from xamoom system - param2 error NSError, can be null

Token.Abstract: API call to get spots inside radius of a location.
Token.Declaration: - (void)spotsWithLocation:(CLLocation *)location radius:(int)radius options:(XMMSpotOptions)options pageSize:(int)pageSize cursor:(NSString *)cursor completion:(void ( ^ ) ( NSArray *spots , bool hasMore , NSString *cursor , NSError *error ))completion

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: Location of the user

Parameter.Name: radius
Parameter.Abstract: Radius in meter

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: XMMSpotOptions to get markers or content

Parameter.Name: pageSize
Parameter.Abstract: PageSize you want to get from xamoom cloud

Parameter.Name: cursor
Parameter.Abstract: Needed when paging, can be null - param1 spots Spots from xamoom system - param2 hasMore True if more items on xamoom cloud - param3 cursor Cursor for paging - param4 error NSError, can be null

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request

Token.Abstract: API call to get spots with specific tags. Returns max. 100 spots.
Token.Declaration: - (void)spotsWithTags:(NSArray *)tags options:(XMMSpotOptions)options completion:(void ( ^ ) ( NSArray *spots , bool hasMore , NSString *cursor , NSError *error ))completion

Parameter.Name: tags
Parameter.Abstract: Array of tags

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: XMMSpotOptions to get markers or content

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request - param1 spots Spots from xamoom system - param2 hasMore True if more items on xamoom cloud - param3 cursor Cursor for paging - param4 error NSError, can be null

Token.Abstract: API call to get spots with specific tags.
Token.Declaration: - (void)spotsWithTags:(NSArray *)tags pageSize:(int)pageSize cursor:(NSString *)cursor options:(XMMSpotOptions)options sort:(XMMSpotSortOptions)sortOptions completion:(void ( ^ ) ( NSArray *spots , bool hasMore , NSString *cursor , NSError *error ))completion

Parameter.Name: tags
Parameter.Abstract: Array of tags

Parameter.Name: pageSize
Parameter.Abstract: PageSize you want to get from xamoom cloud

Parameter.Name: cursor
Parameter.Abstract: Needed when paging, can be null

Parameter.Name: options
Parameter.Abstract: XMMSpotOptions to get markers or content

Parameter.Name: sortOptions
Parameter.Abstract: XMMSpotSortOptions to sort results

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request - param1 spots Spots from xamoom system - param2 hasMore True if more items on xamoom cloud - param3 cursor Cursor for paging - param4 error NSError, can be null

Token.Abstract: API call that returns your system.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request - param1 system System from xamoom system - param2 error NSError, can be null

Token.Abstract: API call that returns your system settings.

Parameter.Name: settingsID
Parameter.Abstract: ID you get from systemWithCompletion:

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request - param1 settings System settings from your xamoom system - param2 error NSError, can be null

Token.Abstract: API call that returns your system style.

Parameter.Name: styleID
Parameter.Abstract: ID you get from systemWithCompletion:

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request - param1 style System style from your xamoom system - param2 error NSError, can be null

Token.Abstract: API call that returns your menu.

Parameter.Name: menuID
Parameter.Abstract: ID you get from systemWithCompletion:

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion block called after finishing network request - param1 style System style from your xamoom system - param2 error NSError, can be null
